sentences.en: A stay is another word for corset in British English.
sentences.cn: 在英式英语中,stay是corset的另一种表达.

sentences.en: All patients were treated with therapeutic exercises, lumbosacral corset with steel bracing , and nonsteroidal anti - inflammatory drugs.
sentences.cn: 两组患者均予以功能锻炼, 以金属支具束腰, 并口服非甾体类消炎药.

sentences.en: An innovation was the corset, separate from the skirt.
sentences.cn: 紧身胸衣是当时的一大创新.

sentences.en: As tight as a corset, the new speed suits make the wearer sleeker and more streamlined.
sentences.cn: 这种新型泳衣穿起来就像紧身胸衣, 可使穿着者身形光滑,更具流线型.

sentences.en: Corset - inspired lacing plays peek - a - boo with curves . Daringly low in front, with slim adjustable straps. Imported polyester.
sentences.cn: 这款睡衣侧边的系带使睡衣内的肌肤若隐若现,把玩性感于无形之中, 实在很让人垂涎! 肩带可调节. 进口聚酯.

sentences.en: Corset: Article of clothing worn to shape or constrict the torso.
sentences.cn: 紧身健美装: 一种贴身内衣或外部装饰,使体形美观或紧束身躯用的衣物.

sentences.en: If you bought me the proper - sized corset, I wouldn't have to squirm.
sentences.cn: 如果你给我买了合适的胸衣, 我根本不会乱动.

sentences.en: The doctor told her not to lace the corset.
sentences.cn: 医生告诉她不要系腹带.

sentences.en: The hardest part was fastening the corset, which she managed after a fashion.
sentences.cn: 按着时尚,她把腹带紧束到最难忍的部位.

sentences.en: Then, performing her song, she emerged from a traditional red phone booth in a studded PVC corset with plumes on her shoulders, knee-high boots and fishnet tights.
sentences.cn: 然后，她的歌声表演，她摆脱了传统的聚氯乙烯镶嵌在她的肩膀，膝盖高的靴子和渔网袜羽毛紧身红色电话亭。

sentences.en: This corset laces at the side.
sentences.cn: 这束腹的带子是在旁边系的.

sentences.en: Thus the corset was never loosened or removed, but tightened more and more.
sentences.cn: 因此,束衣从来不曾放松或被脱掉, 只是系得越来越紧.

trans.tran_cn: （妇女为衬托身体的）紧身胸衣
trans.tran_en: a piece of tight-fitting underwear that women wore especially in the past to make them look thinner
